resources.string: A brave and kind-hearted plumber always ready to save the Mushroom Kingdom and rescue Princess Peach from Bowser is clutches.
Skills: Jumping, throwing fireballs, transforming with power-ups
Mario is younger brother, a bit shy but equally courageous. He often joins Mario on his adventures and occasionally stars in his own missions.
Skills: Higher jumps, ghost hunting with the Poltergust vacuum
The ruler of the Mushroom Kingdom, known for her kindness and bravery. While often captured by Bowser, she doesnt hesitate to face danger when needed.
Skills: Floating in the air, occasional magical abilities
The King of the Koopas and Mario is main antagonist. Despite being a fearsome villain, he sometimes shows a comedic and even cooperative side.
Skills: Breathing fire, superhuman strength, endurance
A loyal assistant to Princess Peach and a resident of the Mushroom Kingdom. He is always ready to help Mario and his friends on their adventures.
Skills: Speed, knowledge of the Mushroom Kingdom
A friendly and loyal dinosaur who helps Mario and Luigi on their adventures. Known for his big appetite and unique tongue abilities.
Skills: Eating enemies, throwing eggs, flutter jumps
welcome to the world of Mario
